resources.string: Are you ready to enter in the World of Shoes?

\tLet’s be honest here, shoes are a major fashion statement. But they’re so much more than that too. Shoes are also for comfort, protection, and work. \n\tImagine riding a horse in sandals, or hiking a mountain in high heels? You couldn’t, could you!? Shoes are so much more important in life than we realize.\n\tThat’s what this article is all about, to show you that these fun facts about shoes prove they’re more than just fancy fashion footwear.
